static def getSolrId(def aClass)

Get the Id that will be stored in the SOLR index: ClassName-Id

static def parseSolrId(def solrDomainId)

Return a map with values class and id parse from the SolrDomainId ie Book-21 would return [class: "Book", id: 21]

static def resultAsObject(def doc)

Parse a Solrj result document and attempt to return an object
